title: Tool Box (Free)
summary: ToolBox has everything just you want.
description: It's essential 24 utility tools using device's hardware and sensors.Max tool series are already downloaded more then 3 million times in Android Market world wide.in Tool Box...- Compass- Leveler- Length measuring tools- Protractor- Vibrometer- Magnetic field Detector- Altimeter- Tracker- Heart Rate Monitor- Decibel Meter- Flash Light- Unit Converter- Magnifier- Calculator- Abacus- Counter- Score Board- Roulette- Barcode Reader- Mirror- Tuner- Stopwatch- Timer- MetronomeIf you have "Tool Box", you don't need to wonder in the market anymore."Tool Box" will help you anytime you want likes Swiss Army Knife.It's Free Ver. and includes AD.
descriptionHTML:
It's essential 24 utility tools using device's hardware and sensors.

Max tool series are already downloaded more then 3 million times in Android Market world wide.

in Tool Box...
- Compass
- Leveler
- Length measuring tools
- Protractor
- Vibrometer
- Magnetic field Detector
- Altimeter
- Tracker
- Heart Rate Monitor
- Decibel Meter

- Flash Light
- Unit Converter
- Magnifier
- Calculator
- Abacus
- Counter
- Score Board
- Roulette
- Barcode Reader
- Mirror
- Tuner

- Stopwatch
- Timer
- Metronome

If you have "Tool Box", you don't need to wonder in the market anymore.

"Tool Box" will help you anytime you want likes Swiss Army Knife.

It's Free Ver. and includes AD.
comments: DO NOT USE THIS APP. AS SOON AS I ACCEPTED THE PERMISSIONS IT STARTED A VIRUS THAT DRAINED MY BATTERY IN LESS THEN 5 MINUTES AND IT ALSO MAKES IT THAT YOU CANOT CHARGE YOUR PHONE. PHONE IS NOW WORTLESS BECAUSE OF NOT BEING ABLE TO TAKE OUT MY BATTERY AND PUT A NEW ONE IN TO UNISTALL THE APP.  DANGER DANGER DANGER. DONT TELL ME IT IS NOT YOUR APP IT IS YOUR APP THAT CAUSED THIS. I WILL SOMEHOW REPORT THIS

Used to be great, but now as soon as another app comes up, like messaging which is all the time, the countdown timer stops counting. This obviously renders the timer completely useless. I have yet to see it reach zero... I would suggest fixing this flaw.
Theoretically, choice of tools is quite good. However, some tools simply don't work, like bubble leveler; Compas won't work without location; There is no scientific calculator, etc.
Its a great app. Provides all sorts of conversions on the go. Have a cool design. Althought some things need to be figured and sorted out. But oververall a great app

if i could give it 10 stars i would..i have loved this app for many years..i want to thakn the genius who created this..i recently got a new phone searched under tools tool box and i couldnt find it so glad to have found it again
Very useful app, the latest updates show Android wear use, how to access it on samsung s2 gear
